metadata.description: Dark Horse Books and CD Projekt Red present The World of Cyberpunk 2077—an extensive examination of the rich lore of a dystopian epic. Learn all about the history of the neon-tinted districts of Night City! Examine cybernetics, weapons, characters and more in this intricate fusion of art and lore that's a necessity for fans of the hit RPG video game, Cyberpunk 2077!
metadata.name: The World of Cyberpunk 2077
